title: Create FO-07 page routes and layout
description:
Create the FO-07 page routes and layout files.

Files to create:
- `app/fo-07/page.tsx` - Main page (copy from FO-04)
- `app/fo-07/layout.tsx` - Layout (copy from FO-04)

Reference:
- `app/fo-04/page.tsx`
- `app/fo-04/layout.tsx`

The page.tsx should import FOExperience from './components/fo-experience'.

⚠️ Do not close this tick until the dev server can load /fo-07 without errors.
acceptance_criteria: npm run dev succeeds and navigating to http://localhost:3000/fo-07 loads without console errors
closed_reason: Created page.tsx, layout.tsx, and fo-07-layout-client.tsx by adapting FO-04 files to FO-07 naming. TypeScript check passes.
